name: Staff of Antimagic
Báculo de antimagia
desc_short: A cane which can seal away magic.
Un bastón capaz de sellar magia.
desc_long: A weapon brought from a certain faraway world. This cane is said to be able to seal away the power of its opponent's magic with just a single swing.
Un arma que proviene de un mundo lejano. Cuentan que este bastón es capaz de sellar el poder mágico de cualquier enemigo con un solo golpe.
